name: Kody
description:
I'm quite happy with this submission ! I'm sorry the game is pretty empty for now but I will update it soon to get better level design, I did it a bit on the rush.

Thanks to @corwel a friend who helps me with game design and musics. If you like what it does you can follow him on twitter or soundcloud

In this game you are Kody a little ninja dude who is seeking for...something...I guess.

I made this game with Unity3D for the #CGAJam, I picked the theme "Gravity".
